name: re:MADI
description:
this is a game about hearing pieces of music broken down into their smaller parts

these parts can then be moved around so you can create new arrangements

this is a reworking of re:ZEPHYR with music by MADI

- Rich (09/03/2020)

produced by Charlie Francis and Maddie Jones
performed by Maddie Jones and Charlie Francis
